alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lafayette; Madison; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 15 at 4:00PM EDT until June 15 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Jefferson County in Big Bend Florida... Northern Lafayette County in Big Bend Florida... Madison County in Big Bend Florida... Taylor County in Big Bend Florida... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 400 PM EDT, local law enforcement reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring in Madison county with numerous roads flooded. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Monticello, Mayo, Perry, Madison, Greenville, Lee, Shady Grove, Lake Bird, Moseley Hall, Ebb, Sirmans, Boyd, Iddo, Secotan, Eridu, Hopewell, Lamont, Hampton Springs, Aucilla and Perry-Foley Airport. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
